mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION(reservation_number, restaurant_no, chat_no, booker_id, plan_date, plan_time, member_count, reservation_status, fixed_status, reservation_date, total_price, pay_option, pay_method, reservation_cancel_type, reservation_cancel_detail, refund_status) VALUES (CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), "%Y%m%e%H%i%S"),FLOOR(RAND()*10000)), #{restaurant.restaurantNo}, #{chat.chatNo}, #{member.memberId}, #{planDate}, #{planTime},#{memberCount}, #{reservationStatus}, #{fixedStatus}, NOW(), #{totalPrice}, #{payOption}, #{payMethod}, #{reservationCancelReason}, #{reservationCancelDetail}, #{refundStatus});

INSERT INTO RESERVATION_ORDER(reservation_no, menu_title, order_count, menu_price) VALUES
(#{reservationNo}, #{item.menuTitle}, #{item.orderCount}, #{item.menuPrice})

INSERT INTO chat_member_no(reservation_no, chat_no, chat_member_id, nickname,ready_check,chat_leader_check,in_out_check) VALUES
(#{reservationNo}, #{item.member.memberId}, #{item.member.nickname}, #{item.readyCheck}, #{item.chatLeaderCheck}, #{item.inOutCheck})
mapper.select: select * from reservation as r Left outer join(select c.chat_no, chat.chat_member_id, chat.nickname from chat c Inner join (Select cb.chat_no, cb.chat_member_id, m.nickname from chat_member cb, member m where cb.chat_member_id = m.member_id) as chat on (c.chat_no = chat.chat_no)) as cm on (r.chat_no = cm.chat_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN reservation_order AS ro ON (r.reservation_no = ro.reservation_no) WHERE r.reservation_no = #{reservationNo}

select * FROM ( select reservation_no, reservation_number, chat_no, restaurant_no, plan_date, plan_time, fixed_date, pay_option, reservation_status FROM reservation ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC LIMIT #{search.startRowNum}, #{search.pageSize}) as r LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT c.chat_no, cm.chat_member_id, m.nickname FROM chat c, chat_member cm right OUTER JOIN (SELECT member_id, NICKNAME FROM member ) as m on (cm.CHAT_MEMBER_ID = m.member_id) WHERE c.chat_no = cm.chat_no) AS ch ON (r.chat_no = ch.chat_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN (select menu_title, order_count, reservation_no from reservation_order) AS ro ON (r.reservation_no = ro.reservation_no)
WHERE ch.chat_member_id = #{member.memberId}

select * FROM ( select reser.reservation_no, reser.reservation_number, reser.chat_no, reser.restaurant_no, reser.plan_date, reser.plan_time, reser.fixed_date, reser.pay_option, reser.reservation_status FROM reservation reser Inner Join (select restaurant_no from restaurant where member_id = ' #{member.memberId}') as et on (reser.restaurant_no = et.restaurant_no) ORDER BY RESERVATION_NO DESC LIMIT #{search.startRowNum}, #{search.pageSize}) as r LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT c.chat_no, cm.chat_member_id, m.nickname FROM chat c, chat_member cm right OUTER JOIN (SELECT member_id, NICKNAME FROM member ) as m on (cm.CHAT_MEMBER_ID = m.member_id) WHERE c.chat_no = cm.chat_no) AS ch ON (r.chat_no = ch.chat_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN (select menu_title, order_count, reservation_no from reservation_order) AS ro ON (r.reservation_no = ro.reservation_no)
